Class DealManager

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class DealManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Deal Manager class that handles all deals in the application
    Version:
    2.1 Created by Leon on 25/2/2015.
    Author:
    Lee Quee Leong & Seah Siu Ngee
